long_description: this jamb cbt software is a utility that packages past utme and ume as a computer based test (cbt) software. it's a needful cbt software for students preparing for jamb utme. these subjects you wont find in other cbt software. yes, you also won't find the beautiful experiences of the real jamb cbt interface,the "first" standard-exam-interface, the no-expiring software, the most-beautifully friendly interface; the first of its kind and off-course designed almost free for your pocket with the free jamb cbt. this cbt exam flexibility software comes in a suite of three dependents applications namely; avalanche client, avalanche server and examloader. examtone.com offers institutions,including schools and multi-nationals a platform to create examination content and conduct online computer based testing to be available anywhere in the world. organizations call it, your exam anywhere, anytime with a push of a button. with examtone.com, organization can reduce their cost of conducting appraisals, tests and recruitment tests.it help schools both secondary and post-secondary to create more tests, assignments and exams for free.

generated_description: avalanche nigeria is a company based in ibadan, oyo state, nigeria, specializing in computer based testing (cbt) software solutions. established in 2012, the company initially focused on providing jamb utme cbt practice software to help students prepare for the unified tertiary institution matriculation examination. over the years, avalanche nigeria has expanded its offerings to include cbt solutions for secondary schools, universities, and organizations. their product suite includes software such as avalanche jamb cbt, avalanche flex, and examtone.com, which supports various examinations including jamb utme, waec, and igcse. the company is known for its user-friendly interfaces, custom software solutions, and commitment to innovation in cbt technology.
